# ARGeoAnchor.AltitudeSource.precise

**Case**

The framework sets the altitude using a high-resolution digital-elevation model.

## Declaration

```swift
case precise
```

## Sources

- **ARGeoAnchor.AltitudeSource.coarse**: The framework sets the altitude using a coarse digital-elevation model.
- **ARGeoAnchor.AltitudeSource.userDefined**: The app defines the altitude.
- **ARGeoAnchor.AltitudeSource.unknown**: Altitude isn’t yet set.
